content: उदीर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ईर्-क्त] {@--1@} Grown, ascended, risen, produced, caused; <ls>Śi. 18. 37.</ls> {@--2@} Puffed up, elated, grown haughty; भवल्लब्धवरोदीर्णस्तारकाख्यो महासुरः <ls>Ku. 2. 32.</ls> {@--3@} Excited, stimulated, roused; <ls>Śi. 1. 32</ls>; <ls>Dk. 43</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">47.</ls> {@--4@} Increased, intense. {@--5@} Generous, great; excellent. {@--6@} Uttered, pronounced; <ls>Śi. 13. 42.</ls> {@--7@} Ready, strung; °धन्वा <ls>U. 5. 11.</ls> --र्णः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
